Note: Controller - D-pad/Buttons (Bitflag) [1] // Don't count macros, only human inputs
Controller - D-pad/Buttons (Bitflag) [2, Best] // Don't count macros, only human inputs

Joystick 1 (8-bit)
0x00 = Inactive
0x01 = Active
0x02 = Game Over
0x03 = Continue ?

Joystick 2 (8-bit)
0x00 = Inactive
0x01 = Active
0x02 = Game Over
0x03 = Continue ?

P1 - Current Move Type (Hit) (8-bit)

0x01=Special Move
0x02=DM
0x03=SDM (Max DM)
0x04=HSDM (Max 2)

Arcade - Round Finishing Move Type (8-bit)

0x01=Special Move
0x02=DM
0x03=SDM (Max DM)
0X04=HSDM (Max 2)

Arcade - Continues Used (8-bit)
0x01 or higher = Missed Omega Rugal

Service - BitFlag (8-bit)
None=No Service
Bit0=Difficulty Level Down
Bit1=Computer's Enemy at 1/3
Bit2=Power Gauge at Max

Match - HSDM Background Flag (8-bit)

0x81 = P1 HSDM
0x82 = P2 HSDM

Game - Human Players Active [1, Clone]

Bit0=P1
Bit1=P2

P2 - Alternative Character - BitFlag (8-bit)
Bit0=1st Char Selected
Bit1=2nd Char Selected
Bit2=3rd Char Selected

P1 - Team (8-bit)

0xFF=No Special Team
0x04=K' Team
0x0e=Womens Fighters Team
0x0f=Clones Team

P1 - Alternative Character - BitFlag (8-bit)
Bit0=1st Char Selected
Bit1=2nd Char Selected
Bit2=3rd Char Selected

P1 - 1st Char Continue Service (8-bit) // should be used alongside "P1 1st Char"
0x00=CPU Level Down
0x01=CPU HP at 1/3
0x02=Power Gauge at Max
0x03=No Service

Neo Geo Mode (8-bit)
0x01=Team Play
0x03=Team vs.
0x00=Single Play
0x02=Single vs.
0x06=Practice

Game - Human Players Active [2, Main]

Bit0=P1
Bit1=P2

Arcade - Opponent Team ID (8-bit)

0x12=Foxy (Mid boss)
0x13=Krizalid (Boss)
0x14=Omega Rugal (Special Boss)

Round - State (Bitflag) // use as bitflags only

Bit0 = KO
Bit1 = Fighting

0x18 = Round Announcing
0x19 = K.O
0x1a = Fighting
0x1c = Round Announcing 2
0x1d = K.O 2
0x1e = Fighting 2
